articles.content:

articles.title: Volkswagen Taigun attracts year-end discounts of up to Rs. 1.46 lakh - CarWale
articles.description: Volkswagen India is offering discounts of up to Rs. 1.46 lakh on its MQB SUV, the Taigun. The offers can be availed in the form of cash discounts, corporate benefits, exchange bonuses, and some special benefits which are valid till 31 December, 2023.
articles.content:
• Available with two powertrain options
  • Offers are valid till 31 December, 2023
